topics.body:
I've got a science type question for those of you who use your brains for something other than pop culture obsessions and perversity.

My question is about genetics, specifically as they relate to MLP. We've seen that ponies can interbreed regardless of individual race, and that any horse type can give birth to any other horse type, so my question is why would there not be natural alicorns? It seems unlikely that horns and wings would be mutually exclusive.
